attributes.action: not give Local authority officials powers over and above the police on right of search and entry to peoples property
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Local Authority officials will have the right to enter peoples homes and property - without a search warrant - to determine Council tax banding to see if there has been any improvements to the property - failure to allow access will result in a fine. The Police have to have a search warrant to enter property and a valid reason that a criminal offence has been committed. Local Authority officials do not have the same reason  apart from seeking further taxes.
